data.prayer: Father, help the 62,267 believers in Ucayali to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ucayali, Peru
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Ucayali, Peru so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 6 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Ucayali, Peru to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Spirit, sanctify the 62,267 believers in Ucayali and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Amawaka people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, guide the church in Ucayali, Peru to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Ucayali who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Ucayali.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.
